description: This file defines a Dart class 'Env' responsible for loading environment variables, specifically the API base URL, using the 'flutter_dotenv' package. It provides a static method to load the URL from a provided map or environment variables, with a default fallback value.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A class providing static environment configuration, notably loading the API base URL from environment variables.

methods.name: loadFromDotEnv
methods.description: Loads environment variables into the class's static fields, setting 'apiBaseUrl' from a provided map, environment variables, or using a default value, and trims trailing slashes.
